task: Create a JSON configuration for an AWS Lambda function that uses Python 3.9 runtime, has 512MB memory, and a 30-second timeout
solution_criteria: JSON must have correct AWS Lambda function configuration keys, specify runtime as 'python3.9', memory size as 512, and timeout as 30

task: Write a Python function to extract the AWS region from a given ARN (Amazon Resource Name)
solution_criteria: Function should parse the ARN string and return the region component (e.g., 'us-east-1' from 'arn:aws:ec2:us-east-1:123456789012:instance/i-1234567890abcdef0')

task: Create a regular expression to validate an AWS S3 bucket name (lowercase, no spaces, 3-63 characters, can contain hyphens)
solution_criteria: Regex should match valid S3 bucket name rules: start with lowercase letter/number, can contain lowercase letters, numbers, hyphens, length between 3-63 characters
